Donate

Hello there! If you’re on this page, then you must love my Open Source work. Here are some of the projects that I’m maintaining actively:

  • Custom 404 Pro: A WordPress plugin that allows users to replace the default 404 page with a custom page from the Pages section in the Admin Panel. Or you can specify a complete URL to redirect on 404. Active Installs: 8,000+

  • jQuery.peekABar: It is the Ultimate Notification Bar Plugin built on top of jQuery. Total Downloads: 10,000+

If you like the work that I do, please consider making a small donation. Thank you for inspiring me to build these amazing plugins :)
